name: @takanarishimbo/quickchart-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol server that generates charts using QuickChart.io
long_description: This Model Context Protocol (MCP) server provides powerful visualization tools using QuickChart.io APIs. Create charts, diagrams, barcodes, QR codes, word clouds, tables, and more.

quickchart_api_base_url.title: QuickChart API Base URL
quickchart_api_base_url.description: QuickChart API server base URL for table endpoints

default_output_dir.title: Default Output Directory
default_output_dir.description: Default directory for saving files (absolute path only, empty defaults to Desktop)

tools.name: create-chart-using-chartjs
tools.description: Create charts using Chart.js and QuickChart.io - get chart image URL or save chart image to file

tools.name: create-chart-using-apexcharts
tools.description: Create charts using ApexCharts library - get chart image URL or save chart image to file

tools.name: create-chart-using-googlecharts
tools.description: Create charts using Google Charts library - get chart image URL or save chart image to file

tools.name: create-chart-using-natural-language
tools.description: Generate charts from natural language descriptions - get chart image URL or save chart image to file

tools.name: create-sparkline-using-chartjs
tools.description: Create compact sparkline charts - get sparkline image URL or save sparkline image to file

tools.name: create-diagram-using-graphviz
tools.description: Create graph diagrams using GraphViz - get diagram image URL or save diagram image to file

tools.name: create-wordcloud
tools.description: Create word cloud visualizations - get word cloud image URL or save word cloud image to file

tools.name: create-barcode
tools.description: Generate barcodes and QR codes - get barcode image URL or save barcode image to file

tools.name: create-qr-code
tools.description: Create QR codes with extensive customization options - get QR code image URL or save QR code image to file

tools.name: create-table
tools.description: Convert data to table images - get table image URL or save table image to file

tools.name: create-watermark
tools.description: Add watermarks and logos to images - get watermarked image URL or save watermarked image to file

tools.name: get-visualization-tool-help
tools.description: Get detailed usage information and examples for all available chart, diagram, and QR code tools

prompts.name: create_sales_chart_url
prompts.description: Create a sales chart and get URL
prompts.text: I need a chart showing our Q4 sales by region. Please create a bar chart or line chart that clearly displays the sales performance. Use action: get_url to provide me with a URL I can share.

prompts.name: create_sales_chart_file
prompts.description: Create a sales chart and save to file
prompts.text: I need a chart showing our Q4 sales by region. Please create a bar chart or line chart that clearly displays the sales performance. Use action: save_file to save it to my desktop.

prompts.name: create_qr_code_url
prompts.description: Create a QR code and get URL
prompts.text: Create a QR code for our contact information. Make it professional and easily scannable. Use action: get_url so I can embed it in our website.

prompts.name: create_qr_code_file
prompts.description: Create a QR code and save to file
prompts.text: Create a QR code for our contact information. Make it professional and easily scannable. Use action: save_file and save it as 'contact_qr.png' on my desktop.

prompts.name: generate_table_url
prompts.description: Generate a table and get URL
prompts.text: Generate a professional table from this CSV data. Format it with clear headers and appropriate styling. Use action: get_url to create a shareable link.

prompts.name: generate_table_file
prompts.description: Generate a table and save to file
prompts.text: Generate a professional table from this CSV data. Format it with clear headers and appropriate styling. Use action: save_file to save it for my presentation.

prompts.name: create_word_cloud_url
prompts.description: Create a word cloud and get URL
prompts.text: Make a word cloud from these customer reviews. Highlight the most frequently mentioned terms in an attractive visual format. Use action: get_url for quick preview and sharing.

prompts.name: create_word_cloud_file
prompts.description: Create a word cloud and save to file
prompts.text: Make a word cloud from these customer reviews. Highlight the most frequently mentioned terms in an attractive visual format. Use action: save_file to save it as 'reviews_wordcloud.png'.

prompts.name: draw_flowchart_url
prompts.description: Draw a flowchart and get URL
prompts.text: Draw a flowchart of our deployment process. Include all major steps and decision points with clear flow directions. Use action: get_url to share with the team.

prompts.name: draw_flowchart_file
prompts.description: Draw a flowchart and save to file
prompts.text: Draw a flowchart of our deployment process. Include all major steps and decision points with clear flow directions. Use action: save_file to save it in our documentation folder.
